name: Logo Design
description: Not only is this watch stylish but has such amazing features as well. What watch actually tells you to take 3 minutes of breathing time? Hello Stress Breathing. It Monitors my heart rate and blood pressure as well.

name: Stationery Design
description: I received and have been wearing the watch for a week now, and I absolutely love it. This is my first smart watch, so I have nothing to compare it to, but i can’t imagine that whatever an Apple Watch has over this is worth an extra $300 or more.

name: Packaging
description: I’m so glad that I had seen this device on sale. I have an Omron for working out. This FirYawee Smartwatch has much more options and color features that link and sync to a phone app. From the phone app you can control the watch; or you can control the watch by itself. I’m so happy with this purchase.

name: Brand identity
description: Love this watch! I've had it for almost a year now and have had no issues at all. Tracking seems to be pretty accurate and jives with the step tracking on my Galaxy phone. I've unintentionally bashed it many times when doing daily stuff and while I do have some scratches on the face, the watch has held up beautifully.

name: Printable
description: This new watch is holding battery life super great! I am very happy with the functions of the watch. The watch faces that are available are nice and they update them quickly with new ones to choose from.

name: Others Design
description: I wanted a smart watch, but didn't want to pay a fortune. My husband surprised me with this and I love it! I have all the features I wanted at a fraction of the price. It has a long lasting battery, and when needed, you can re-charge it!
